Verses: 1 niyaayappiramaanaththai Arindhirukkiravargaludane Pesugiren. Sagodharare, Oru Manushan Uyirodirukkumalavum Niyaayappiramaanam Avanai Aalugiradhendru Ariyaamalirukkireergalaa?

2 adheppadiyendraal, Purushanaiyudaiya Sthiree Than Purushan Uyirodirukkumalavum Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadiye Avanudaiya Nibandhanaikku Utpattirukkiraal; Purushan Mariththa Pinbu Purushanaippatriya Piramaanaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaayirukkiraal.

3 aagaiyaal, Purushan Uyirodirukkaiyil Aval Veroru Purushanai Vivaagampanninaal Vibasaariyennappaduvaal; Purushan Mariththapinbu Aval Andhap Piramaanaththinindru Vidudhalaiyaanapadiyaal, Veroru Purushanai Vivaagam Panninaalum Vibasaariyalla.

4 appadippola, En Sagodharare, Neengal Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundha Kiristhu Ennum Veroruvarudaiyavargalaagi, Dhevanukkendru Kanikodukkumpadi Kiristhuvin Sareeraththinaale Niyaayappiramaanaththukku Mariththavargalaaneergal.

5 naam Maamsaththirku Utpattirundha Kaalaththil Niyaayappiramaanaththinaale Thondriya Paava Ichchaigal Maranaththirku Edhuvaana Kanigalaik Kodukkaththakkadhaaga Nammudaiya Avayavangalile Belanseydhadhu.

6 ippozhudho Naam Pazhamaiyaana Ezhuththinpadiyalla, Pudhumaiyaana Aaviyinpadi Oozhiyanjseyyaththakkadhaaga, Nammaik Kattiyirundha Niyaayappiramaanaththukku Naam Mariththavargalaagi, Adhinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkappattirukkirom.

7 aagaiyaal Enna Solluvom? Niyaayappiramaanam Paavamo? Allave. Paavam Innadhendru Niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Naan Arindheneyandri Matrappadi Ariyavillai; Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga Endru Niyaayappiramaanam Sollaadhirundhaal, Ichchai Paavam Endru Naan Ariyaamaliruppene.
8 paavamaanadhu Karpanaiyinaale Samayampetruch Sagalavidha Ichchaigalaiyum Ennil Nadappiththadhu. Niyaayappiramaanamillaavittaal Paavam Seththadhaayirukkume.
9 munne Niyaayappiramaanamillaadhavanaayirundhapodhu Naan Jeevanullavanaayirundhen; Karpanai Vandhapodhu Paavam Uyirkondadhu, Naan Mariththavanaanen.
10 ippadiyirukka, Jeevanukkedhuvaana Karpanaiye Enakku Maranaththukkedhuvaayirukkakkanden.
11 paavamaanadhu Karpanaiyinaale Samayampetru, Ennai Vanjiththu, Adhinaale Ennaik Kondradhu.
12 aagaiyaal Niyaayappiramaanam Parisuththamulladhudhaan, Karpanaiyum Parisuththamaayum Needhiyaayum Nanmaiyaayum Irukkiradhu.

13 ippadiyirukka, Nanmaiyaanadhu Enakku Maranamaayitro? Appadiyalla; Paavame Enakku Maranamaayitru; Paavam Karpanaiyinaale Migundha Paavamulladhaagumpadikkum, Adhu Nanmaiyaanadhaik Kondu Enakku Maranaththai Undaakkinadhinaale, Paavamaagave Vilangumpadikkum Appadiyaayitru.
14 melum, Namakkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Niyaayappiramaanam Aavikkuriyadhaayirukkiradhu, Naano Paavaththukkuk Keezhaaga Virkappattu, Maamsaththukkuriyavanaayirukkiren.
15 eppadiyenil, Naan Seygiradhu Enakke Sammadhiyillai; Naan Virumbugiradhai Seyyaamal, Naan Verukkiradhaiye Seygiren.
16 ippadi Naan Virumbaadhadhai Seygiravanaayirukka, Niyaayappiramaanam Nalladhendru Oththukkollugirene.
17 aadhalaal Naan Alla, Enakkul Vaasamaayirukkira Paavame Appadi Seygiradhu.

18 adheppadiyenil, Ennidaththil, Adhaavadhu, En Maamsaththil, Nanmai Vaasamaayirukkiradhillaiyendru Naan Arindhirukkiren; Nanmaiseyyavendumengira Viruppam Ennidaththilirukkiradhu, Nanmaiseyvadho Ennidaththilillai.
19 aadhalaal Naan Virumbugira Nanmaiyai Seyyaamal, Virumbaadha Theemaiyaiye Seygiren.
20 andhappadi Naan Virumbaadhadhai Naan Seydhaal, Naan Alla, Enakkulle Vaasamaayirukkira Paavame Appadi Seygiradhu.
21 aanapadiyaal Nanmaiseyya Virumbugira Ennidaththil Theemaiyundengira Oru Piramaanaththaik Kaangiren.
22 ullaana Manushanukketrapadi Dhevanudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththinmel Piriyamaayirukkiren.

23 aagilum En Manadhin Piramaanaththukku Virodhamaaip Poraadugira Veroru Piramaanaththai En Avayavangalil Irukkak Kaangiren; Adhu En Avayavangalil Undaayirukkira Paavappiramaanaththukku Ennai Siraiyaakkik Kollugiradhu.
24 nirppandhamaana Manushan Naan! Indha Maranasareeraththinindru Yaar Ennai Vidudhalaiyaakkuvaar?

25 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhumoolamaai Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren. Aadhalaal Naane En Manadhinaale Dhevanudaiya Niyaayappiramaanaththukkum, Maamsaththinaaleyo Paavappiramaanaththukkum Oozhiyanjseygiren.
